name: UGG Selima Waterproof Boots - Women's
description: Function and fashion, when you need dry feet and something that goes with the rest of your outfit. Super soft wool is soft against your skin, with an eye-catching buckle for a bit of style.Waterproof leather and suede is fully seam-sealed for weather protection.Wool and lyocell lining and wool insole keep feet warm.Gusseted zipper for easy entry.Spider Rubber® outsole provides grip on wet terrain.
